meta.title: Carlos Segura Garcia - Software Engineer
meta.description: Software Engineer specialized in Vue.js frontend development. Explore my portfolio of web applications and innovative projects.

description.part1: I'm a software engineer specialized in front-end development with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web applications,

description2.p1: Since I was a child, my greatest passion has been music. I worked as a composer and producer for several years, with a musical journey spanning 19 years — from classical conservatory to modern music schools, Jazz studies, and ultimately earning a degree in Music History, Science, and Music Technology. However, faced with limited career opportunities in Spain, I decided to explore a different path.
description2.p2: During my final year of studies, I discovered the world of web development, which eventually evolved into both my primary profession and cherished hobby.
description2.p3: Throughout these years, I've not only worked with various companies on exciting projects but have also delved deep into multiple technologies. My curiosity has led me beyond just web and frontend development, exploring areas like backend, UX/UI design, and cybersecurity.

summary.title: Summary
summary.techStack: Technology stack I have worked with:

tasks.1: I developed a web app from scratch for BBVA to manage their projects budget
tasks.2: I worked with a team of 3 developers, being the only frontend developer
tasks.3: I was responsible for the development of the whole app from scratch
tasks.4: I worked using agile methodologies (Kanban board)
tasks.5: I used Vue 2, Vuex, Vuetify, SCSS and JavaScript

tasks.1: I developed a landing page as internal project using Next 13, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and Three.js
tasks.2: I helped to get better performance and SEO optimization for the landing page
tasks.3: I developed a SPA as internal project using React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and AG Grid
tasks.4: I worked in several projects for McKinsey & Company and Repsol using Vue 3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and AG Grid
tasks.6: I worked in an optimal environment where best practices prevailed, using Gitflow, conventional commits and clean code
tasks.7: I worked in communication with the client in English
tasks.9: I worked in collaboration with the design team to improve the UI/UX of the app

tasks.1: I helped to migrate a project from Vue 2/Nuxt 2 to Vue 3/Nuxt 3
tasks.2: I was nominated for tech lead of the team due to my high performance and capabilities
tasks.3: I helped to implement from scratch a new domain-based architecture (Domain-Driven Design)
tasks.4: I communicated in English with the client's frontend lead and the other developers on a daily basis
tasks.5: I helped develop unit tests under the Behavior Driven Development philosophy

tasks.1: I developed as main developer a complex SPA SaaS from scratch using the latest frontend technologies
tasks.2: I worked closely with the UX/UI team to implement pixel perfect on the frontend
tasks.3: I implemented architectural improvements to more efficiently modularize the code
tasks.4: I implemented numerous features in the context of 2D canvas, representing astronomical information
tasks.5: I worked using Gitflow, conventional commits and best practices

tasks.1: I'm working in an internal squad for El Corte Inglés to develop a new e-commerce experience
tasks.2: I am developing new features and solving issues and defects in several projects for a new search experience.
tasks.3: I work on developing new features that expand or improve the website experience, as well as refactoring and improving its performance.
tasks.4: I am developing unit tests with Jest, Testing Library and Vue Test Utils.
tasks.5: I collaborate with the QA team for manual testing.
tasks.6: I am working under Scrum methodology.
